author: veithen
msg: Added a test case for OMFactory#createOMElement(String, OMNamespace) and updated the Javadoc.

author: sf
msg: correctly handle the changed *_DN format in 2.3.11+

author: sf
msg: Change the format of the SSL_{CLIENT,SERVER}_{I,S}_DN variables
to be RFC 2253 compatible, convert non-ASCII characters to UTF8, and
escape other special characters with backslashes. The old format can
still be used with the LegacyDNStringFormat argument to SSLOptions.

author: cmueller
msg: MinaConsumer and MinaProducer now use the endpoint reference from its super class and doesn'n manager its own instance variable
